Today in Donegal, Mageroaty and Bloody Foreland are lighting up with solid 11 ft @ 16s W swell and light SE winds at 9 mph. Expect clean conditions throughout the day, especially during the tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 6 ft @ 12s W, still offering fun waves at spots like Magheroaty and Bloody Foreland, with light E winds. The day after, conditions remain consistent with 4 ft @ 12s W swell, making for enjoyable sessions at various beaches. Best: today.
